0.text: Bug 116744  Dynamic text content type has no effect.

1.text: I have a db field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html> ...</html> tag.

2.text: 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag 3) Text with RTF tags  I use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.

3.text: The report  displays the same results whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Type  property to Auto, Plain, or HTML.

4.text: Expected results: For Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.

5.text: For Auto, I expect content 1, 2 and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF  tags.

6.text: For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and  content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
